event.title: Lunchtime talk: Twilio
event.description:
One of Pervasive Media Studio's friday open studio talks that sounds right up our street.

Over the past few years, Pervasive Media Studio residents have used cloud communications service Twilio in a number of projects, from haunted zoetropes to mass musical phone calls. In this lunchtime talk, Director of Twilio Europe, James Parton will tell us more about Twilio and introduce us to some of his favourite projects.
FFI: http://www.pmstudio.co.uk/events/fri-12042013-100pm

Friday, 12 April[masked]:00pm - 2:00pm, Pervasive Media Studio, Free
